90 Mile Beach Snapper Classic – poor fishing on first day, but fishers still happy https://www.nzherald.co.nz https://www.nzherald.co.nz Mike Dinsdale1200 fishers at 90 Mile Beach Snapper Classic in Far North Tue, 04 Mar 2025 05:15:44 +0000 Kurt Lunjevich, from Whakapara, and his nephew Luca Philips, from Rotorua, with fish caught at the 90 Mile Beach Snapper Bonanza on the first day of fishing on Tuesday. Kurt caught the fish Luca is holding, while the one he has was caught by Nadine Boynton.
